tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE regions (
	region_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	region_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	population INT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE demographic_data (
	demographic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	region_id INT,
	demographic_category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	percentage FLOAT NOT NULL,
	FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES regions(region_id)
)

CREATE TABLE ads_targeting (
	ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	region_id INT,
	demographic_id INT,
	ad_content TEXT,
	FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES regions(region_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (demographic_id) REFERENCES demographic_data(demographic_id)
)

CREATE TABLE DemographicData (
 data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 region_id UUID REFERENCES Region(region_id),
 age INTEGER NOT NULL,
 gender VARCHAR(10),
 income DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE TargetedAds (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   ad_id INT,
   gender VARCHAR(20),
   age_group VARCHAR(20),
   region_id INT
);
